sql.statement: create table no0000012_wfdetailset ( id int not null, wfId int not null, nodeIds varchar(512) not null, detailtable varchar(512) not null, canAdd int default 0, canEditOld int default 0, canDelOld int default 1, mustAdd int default 0, del int default 1 )
create sequence no0000012_wfdetailset_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999 start with 1 increment by 1
create table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem ( id int not null, wdsId int not null, fieldId int not null, edittype int not null, del int default 1 )
create sequence no0000012_wfdetailsetitem_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999 start with 1 increment by 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add paging int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add excelImport int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add excelOutput int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add searching int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add authType int default -1
create table no0000012_wfdetailkey ( dbId int not null, dbKey varchar(512) not null )
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add canDel int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add isTreetable int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add isModal int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add defaultrow int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add treenode varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add excelOutputAll int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailkey add requestid int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add width varchar(512) default '1024'
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add width varchar(512) default '150'
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add fixed varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailkey add dn int
create table no0000012_wfdetaillink ( wdsId int not null, fDn int not null, cDn int not null, fShowField varchar(512), fLinkField varchar(512), cLinkField varchar(512), linkType int not null )
alter table no0000012_wfdetailkey add fDbKey varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add nodeId int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add mergeRow int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add chDetail varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add impTypeAuth varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add height varchar(512) default '0'
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add defaultValue varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add chDetailLink varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add chDetailLinkType varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add numCon int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add cdata varchar(M) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add cdataOrder float default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add tdata varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add tdataField varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add tdatashowonly int default 0
update no0000012_wfdetailset set tdatashowonly = 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add pageSize int default 10
update no0000012_wfdetailset set pageSize = 10
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add shownamecolor varchar(512) default '#111'
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add detailbackgroudcolor varchar(512) default '#fff'
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add searchingforcol int default 1

create table no0000012_wfdetailRemark ( id int not null, remarkstatus int default 0, remarkstring varchar(512) not null, dbid varchar(512) not null, wffieldid varchar(512) not null, reqId varchar(512) not null, detailtable varchar(512) not null )
create sequence no0000012_Remark_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999 start with 1 increment by 1

create table no0000012_wfdetailRemarkLog ( id int not null, oldvalue varchar(512) not null, newvalue varchar(512) not null, dbid varchar(512) not null, wffieldid varchar(512) not null, reqId varchar(512) not null, detailtable varchar(512) not null, userid varchar(512) not null, updatetimes date )
create sequence no0000012_RemarkLog_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999 start with 1 increment by 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add canRemark int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add noZeroEnd int default 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add showsn int default 1
update no0000012_wfdetailset set showsn = 0

create table no0000012_RemarkMarginLog ( id int not null, mainid varchar(512) not null, content varchar(512) not null, operate varchar(512) not null, userid varchar(512) not null, time date, dbid varchar(512) not null, wffieldid varchar(512) not null, reqId varchar(512) not null, detailtable varchar(512) not null )
create sequence no0000012_RemarkMargin_seq minvalue 1 maxvalue 99999999 start with 1 increment by 1
alter table no0000012_wfdetailsetitem add cdatadbname varchar(512) default ''
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add isMobile int default 0
alter table no0000012_wfdetailset add mustHide varchar(512) default ''
